projects.name: Cryptocurrency price prediction using machine learning
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using LSTM networks and regression techniques to predict cryptocurrency prices, focusing on Bitcoin and Ethereum. Deployed a Streamlit web application for user-friendly access to predictive insights, enhancing decision-making for investors in the volatile cryptocurrency market.

projects.name: Detection of Spoiled Fish
projects.description: Engineered a machine learning model to detect spoiled fish through analysis of RGB color values, achieving high accuracy in identifying spoilage indicators. Implemented a real-time monitoring system that uses RGB value variations to assess fish freshness, enhancing quality control measures.

experiences.description: Website Hosting on AWS: Deployed a website using EC2, RDS, and S3 services, ensuring reliable and scalable infrastructure. Domain and DNS Management: Configured Route 53 for custom domain routing and efficient DNS management. Performance Optimization: Implemented auto-scaling to manage traffic loads and optimize costs.
